articles.description: California-based lunar photographer Andrew McCarthy spent spent hours over 22 consecutive nights, taking thousands of photos of the moon as it waxed and then waned through nearly a full orbit.
articles.content:
At first glance, you'd be forgiven for mistaking this footage for a scene from the latest science fiction blockbuster. 
But it is very much real, and shows in dramatic detail just how much the moon … [+6377 chars]
